data.title: List of naturalized American citizens
data.text:
Add languages

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Citizenship of the United States of America can be acquired in different ways, one of those being naturalization.

Art and literature

[edit]

Authors

[edit]

Jackie Collins – Born in the United Kingdom. Became a U.S. citizen in 1960.[1]

Thomas B. Costain – Born in Canada. Became an American citizen in 1920.

Immaculée Ilibagiza – Born and raised in Rwanda. Became a U.S. citizen in 2013.[2]

Klaus Mann – Born in Germany. Became a U.S. citizen in 1943.

David Morrell – Born and raised in Canada. Became a U.S. citizen in 1993.[3]

Gerda Weissmann Klein – Born and raised in Poland. Became a U.S. citizen in 1948.
